name: 楊勝明
objective: 此課程包含以下主題：(1)直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2)馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3)數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
schedule:
1. introduction of Matlab/Simulink, DC Motor model
2. DC motor current control, pole-zero, frequency domain design
3. velocity and position control, tuning
4. position control system analysis and design, feedforward
5. velocity estimator design
6. velocity estimator performance analysis
7. mixed analog/digital control system simulation
8. digital control system tuning
9. digital control system with velocity estimator
10. Mid-term exam
11. IPM-PMSM motor model
12. current control for PMSM
13. tuning and feedforward in current controllers
14. PMSM position and velocity control
15. position and velocity control tuning
16. sinusoidal PWM
17. space vector PWM
18. Final exam.
materials:
No text.
References:
1. Control System Design Guide, 3th Editions, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.全華圖書.
2. Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
